title: in game mouse
body:
Hi everyone {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 
iam playing the game 

resolution 
3840 * 2160  on a 4K 32 inch Asus monitor  

VGA is 
Amd R9 fury series

in the game the mouse is to small 
how i can increase the size of it 
it hard to see it during a fight 

Thanks

replies.body: We don't currently support 4K, and you may see issues like this especially if alt+tabbing.  Your best bet would be to reduce the resolution of your game and screen, or use another monitor entirely.  Hopefully, reducing the resolution will help!
